name: Journey (itch)
description:
This game is a game that i made using RPG maker MV. It took me about two and a half months. It's pretty cool I think.

With a keyboard, use arrow keys to move about,  spacebar to interact/select, shift to sprint/speed up text and esc to go back/open menu/delete. You can also use a mouse to move and select things

On mobile, tap to move about/interact/select, and tap with two fingers to open menu/go back

There are some secrets in there too... watch out

thats all.
